Room.Name: Underground Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a long underground passage, part of a labrynth of passages.
Room.LongDescription: Except for the torches and lanterns you might be carrying there is no source of light in this part of the passage. Your footsteps echo from the cold stone floor, and a trickle of water runs down the center of the passsageway. Further north you can hear mechanical noises and garbled shouts in what sounds like a foreign tongue.
